sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT D.DEFECT_ID_SQ, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE = P.TASK_GB) AS TASK_GB, D.PG_ID, P.PG_NM, D.DEFECT_TITLE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE = D.DEFECT_GB) AS DEFECT_GB, (SELECT USER_TB.USER_NM FROM USER_TB WHERE D.USER_TEST_ID = USER_TB.USER_ID) AS USER_TEST_ID, D.ENROLL_DT, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE = D.ACTION_ST) AS ACTION_ST FROM DEFECT_TB AS D, PG_TB AS P WHERE D.PG_ID = P.PG_ID ORDER BY D.DEFECT_ID_SQ ) as C WHERE 1=1
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT * FROM DEFECT_TB ) as c WHERE 1=1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT D.DEFECT_ID_SQ, D.DEFECT_TITLE, D.DEFECT_CONTENT, D.PG_ID, (SELECT USER_TB.USER_NM FROM USER_TB WHERE D.USER_TEST_ID = USER_TB.USER_ID) AS USER_TEST_ID, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE = D.DEFECT_GB) AS DEFECT_GB, D.ENROLL_DT, D.ACTION_CONTENT, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE = D.ACTION_ST) AS ACTION_ST, D.ACTION_DT, D.TESTSCENARIO_ID, (SELECT USER_TB.USER_NM FROM USER_TB WHERE P.USER_DEV_ID = USER_TB.USER_ID) AS USER_DEV_ID, P.PG_NM, P.SYS_GB, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE = P.TASK_GB) AS TASK_GB, P.USE_YN, P.PJT_ID FROM DEFECT_TB AS D, PG_TB AS P WHERE D.PG_ID = P.PG_ID AND D.DEFECT_ID_SQ = #defectIdSq# AND P.PG_ID = #pgId# ) as C WHERE 1=1
SELECT DEFECT_ID_SQ FROM DEFECT_TB ORDER BY DEFECT_ID_SQ DESC LIMIT 1;
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DEFECT_TB (DEFECT_ID_SQ, DEFECT_TITLE, DEFECT_CONTENT, PG_ID, USER_TEST_ID, DEFECT_GB, ENROLL_DT) VALUES (#defectIdSq#, #defectTitle#, #defectContent#, #pgId#, #userTestId#, #defectGb#, SYSDATE() )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DEFECT_TB SET DEFECT_TITLE = #defectTitle#, DEFECT_CONTENT = #defectContent#, USER_TEST_ID = (SELECT USER_ID FROM USER_TB WHERE USER_NM = #userTestId#), DEFECT_GB = (SELECT CODE FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #defectGb#), ACTION_CONTENT = #actionContent#, ACTION_ST = (SELECT CODE FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #actionSt#), ACTION_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE DEFECT_ID_SQ = #defectIdSq#
